def max_subarray_sum(a):
    max_sum = a[1]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for num in a[1:]:
        current_sum = max(num, current_sum + num)
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(a):
    max_sum = a[-1]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for num in a[1:]:
        current_sum = max(num, current_sum + num)
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(a):
    max_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for num in a[1:]:
        current_sum = max(num, current_sum - num)
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(a):
    max_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for num in a[1:]:
        current_sum = max(num, current_sum * num)
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum
